thread.section_title: PlushBeds.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PlushBeds.com | plushbeds.com
thread.title: Theodore M.

author: Theodore M.
title: Theodore M.
text:
I received the bed exactly when company when the company promised.
One thing to prepare for is that this a heavy bed and you'll need help to get it set up.
Everything about this bed is solid and well built. I haven't slept this well in years.
The company web site was very easy to navigate and informative. I would recommend their products and their service to anyone.
